description: Code identifying the fuel or consumable type in the fleet system; serves as the primary lookup key for this record.
Human-readable name/description of the fuel or consumable type associated with the code.
User ID or process that created this record in the system.
Date and time when the record was first created.
User ID or process that last modified this record.
Date and time of the most recent update to this record.
Default monetary cost per unit of this fuel/consumable; unit of measure may vary by configurationâ€”confirm with SME.
Likely the general ledger account number to charge for transactions involving this fuel/consumable; confirm with SME.
